DOC.brief_title: Effect of Loading of Midazolam or Dexmedetomidine on Hemodynamics
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators hypothesized substitution of loading of dexmedetomidine for midazolam could reduce hemodynamic instability during spinal anesthesia for knee arthroscopy.
DOC.criteria: patients who were planned to undergo knee arthroscopy under spinal anesthesia age < 20 years underlying heart, liver or kidney disease hypersensitivity to midazolam or dexmedetomidine
